abstract: The resignation of Bank of America’s chief executive leaves Vikram Pandit of Citigroup as the only surviving chief executive among the handful of companies to receive “extraordinary” government aid.
snippet: The resignation of Bank of America’s chief executive leaves Vikram Pandit of Citigroup as the only surviving chief executive among the handful of companies to receive “extraordinary” government aid.

headline.main: As Lewis Exits, Pandit Hangs On
